page.title: 14CONSERVATION IN CARLTON
page.content: Our area is mainly country side. Some people are{trying}to{save land}for wild life by{planting trees}and{ {building ponds}for{ducks}and{waterlife A farmer called{Mr Farnsworth}is making a{badger set}and{planting}some more{trees}in his {wood.}Instead of taking all the hedges down to make his {field}bigger. He is keeping them up so that{insects}and{wild flowers}can {grow.}Mr Farnsworth is also making {ponds}in his{wood}for{creatures }like{ {frogs,newts,herons}and{kingfishers,} which will also make nests there.Not many people in our country side are planting {oak}trees because they take a couple of hundred years to grow to their full size,but Mr Farnsworth as planted some in his wood .They will be there in a few hundred years time When Mr Farnsworth dies,his sons will take over and look after the wood.
